name: Meowsplosion
description:
stick those boom chunks into those fat lipped monster's mouths and watch their bowels and body fuids remove themselves from their host's body. REALISTIC GORE SIMULATION!

a to go left

d to go right 

and s to smack an explosive device into the ground with force of a thousand Freds Jones's.

the images used in this project were

Enemy

cat in a trash can

inspiration for main character

the goal of the game

ITS A BOMB
